channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 随着美国关键数据的临近，美元下跌；日元因 CPI 上涨而走强
item.description: The dollar traded on the back foot on Tuesday, as markets looked ahead to a week of key U.S. economic data that will provide fresh signals on how soon the Federal Reserve may begin cutting interest rates.翻译:周二美元走势不利，因为市场期待一周的美国关键经济数据，这些数据将提供有关美联储可能多久开始降息的新信号。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 夏威夷邻国基里巴斯发现中国警察后美国发出警告
item.description: The United States on Monday cautioned Pacific Islands nations against assistance from Chinese security forces after Reuters reported that Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a neighbor of Hawaii.翻译:在路透社报道中国警察正在夏威夷邻国基里巴斯偏远环礁国家工作后，美国周一警告太平洋岛国不要接受中国安全部队的援助。
item.author: David Brunnstrom, Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国房地产危机刺激需求，重组专家增加香港员工
item.description: Global restructuring specialists Alvarez & Marsal and Houlihan Lokey have boosted headcount in Hong Kong as China's property crisis results in a surge in debt restructuring deals - making them a rare bright spot in hiring for the city's financial sector.翻译:随着中国的房地产危机导致债务重组交易激增，全球重组专家 Alvarez & Marsal 和 Houlihan Lokey 增加了在香港的员工数量，使其成为香港金融业招聘中罕见的亮点。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim

item.title: 巴西BRF结束七连败，扭亏为盈
item.description: Brazilian poultry and pork processor BRF SA turned a profit of 823 million reais ($165.26 million) in the final three months of 2023, according to an earnings statement on Monday, ending a seven-quarter losing streak.翻译:根据周一的财报，巴西家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF SA 在 2023 年最后三个月实现利润 8.23 亿雷亚尔（1.6526 亿美元），结束了连续七个季度的亏损。
item.author: Ana Mano

item.title: 美国参议院委员会就中国药明康德和华大基因法案举行听证会
item.description: A U.S. Senate committee said on Monday it will hold a hearing on March 6 on a bill that would prohibit federal agencies from contracting with China's BGI, WuXi AppTec and other biotechnology companies of concern.翻译:美国参议院一个委员会周一表示，将于 3 月 6 日就一项禁止联邦机构与中国华大基因、药明康德和其他受关注生物技术公司签订合同的法案举行听证会。
item.author: Karen Freifeld

item.title: 美国称中国航空公司可将美国航班增加至每周 50 班
item.description: Chinese passenger airlines will be allowed to boost their weekly round-trip U.S. flights to 50 starting on March 31, up from the current 35, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Monday, returning the market to about one-third of pre-pandemic levels.翻译:美国运输部周一表示，从 3 月 31 日起，中国客运航空公司将被允许将每周往返美国的航班从目前的 35 班增加到 50 班，从而使市场恢复到大流行前水平的约三分之一。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 古巴顶级雪茄制造商因高端需求蓬勃发展而创下销售纪录
item.description: Cuba's top cigar maker Habanos said on Monday its sales had soared to a record $721 million in 2023, a benchmark the company's executives attributed to booming demand for its most luxurious, high-end smokes in markets including China.翻译:古巴顶级雪茄制造商哈伯纳斯周一表示，其2023年销售额已飙升至创纪录的7.21亿美元，该公司高管将这一基准归因于中国等市场对其最豪华、高端雪茄的需求旺盛。
item.author: Dave Sherwood

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本两年来首次通胀低于预期？
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 国际原子能机构文件称，伊朗浓缩铀库存减少至60%，但问题依然存在
item.description: Iran's stock of uranium enriched to near weapons-grade has shrunk, bringing it below the theoretical threshold at which it could produce three atom bombs, but problems with inspectors persist, reports by the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Monday.翻译:联合国核监督机构周一的报告称，伊朗的接近武器级的浓缩铀库存已经减少，使其低于可以生产三颗原子弹的理论阈值，但检查人员的问题仍然存在。
item.author: Francois Murphy

item.title: 独家：财政部称美国对银行的警告减缓了俄罗斯的资金流动
item.description: Washington's threat to hit foreign financial institutions with sanctions has made a significant difference in financial flows between Russia and countries such as Turkey, the United Arab Emirates and Kazakhstan, said Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo.翻译:美国财政部副部长沃利·阿德耶莫表示，华盛顿威胁对外国金融机构实施制裁，这对俄罗斯与土耳其、阿拉伯联合酋长国和哈萨克斯坦等国之间的资金流动产生了重大影响。
item.author: Daphne Psaledakis, David Lawder, Andrea Shalal

item.title: 发言人称美国商会会长本周将访华
item.description: The chief executive of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, Suzanne Clark, is leading a delegation of former U.S. government officials to Beijing this week, the group said.翻译:该组织表示，美国商会首席执行官苏珊娜·克拉克本周将率领一个由前美国政府官员组成的代表团访问北京。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在阿布扎比会谈中对美国关税和台湾问题表达“严重”关切
item.description: China's commerce minister Wang Wentao expressed the country's "solemn concerns" over U.S. tariffs and Taiwan-related issues in the economic and trade fields on Monday when meeting with U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai.翻译:中国商务部部长王文涛周一在会见美国贸易代表戴凯时表达了中国对美国关税和涉台经贸领域问题的“严重关切”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国最新的长征火箭将在创纪录的任务年首次亮相
item.description: China's Long March 12, capable of sending bigger satellites with more functionalities into the Earth's orbit, is expected to make its debut flight in 2024, in a year of record launch missions for the country, state media reported on Monday.翻译:据官方媒体周一报道，中国的长征十二号能够将更大、功能更多的卫星送入地球轨道，预计将于 2024 年首次飞行，今年是中国发射任务创纪录的一年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着券商开始关注中国需求，亚玛芬体育股价上涨
item.description: Amer Sports shares rose as much as 3.5% on Monday as analysts initiated coverage with largely bullish ratings and highlighted strong demand for the Wilson tennis racket maker's premium outdoor and sportswear products in China.翻译:周一，Amer Sports 股价上涨 3.5%，原因是分析师给予了基本看涨的评级，并突显了中国市场对威尔逊网球拍制造商的优质户外和运动服装产品的强劲需求。
item.author: Ananya Mariam Rajesh

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度考虑对低品位铁矿石征收出口税
item.description: India is considering an export tax on low-grade iron ore after small steel producers urged the government to curb its overseas sales, two sources directly involved in the matter said.翻译:两名直接参与此事的消息人士称，在小型钢铁生产商敦促政府限制其海外销售后，印度正在考虑对低品位铁矿石征收出口税。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 随着中国竞争对手的扩张，雷诺在日内瓦的欧洲电动汽车防御中处于领先地位
item.description: Renault and China-owned MG launched new electrified cars in Europe at the Geneva car show on Monday as Chinese automakers seek to take more market share from legacy European rivals.翻译:雷诺和中资名爵周一在日内瓦车展上在欧洲推出了新款电动汽车，中国汽车制造商寻求从欧洲传统竞争对手手中夺取更多市场份额。
item.author: Gilles Guillaume, Nick Carey

item.title: 早盘竞价：随着个人消费支出 (PCE) 的出现，蓬勃发展的股市回落
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 1月份中资银行通过客户掉期购买美元创历史新高
item.description: Chinese banks purchased the most dollars from their clients via FX swaps in January, official data from the FX regulator showed on Monday, suggesting exporters preferred to only temporarily acquire the local currency while holding on to dollars.翻译:外汇监管机构周一公布的官方数据显示，一月份，中国的银行通过外汇掉期从客户那里购买了最多的美元，这表明出口商更愿意在持有美元的同时暂时购买当地货币。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 本周数据密集，美元下跌
item.description: The dollar was mostly lower on Monday ahead of U.S. durable goods orders and an inflation reading this week that could provide more information on how soon the Federal Reserve may begin cutting interest rates.翻译:周一，在美国耐用品订单和本周通胀数据公布之前，美元大多走低，这可能会提供有关美联储可能多久开始降息的更多信息。
item.author: Caroline Valetkevitch

item.title: 全球股市指数低迷，通胀成为焦点，油价攀升
item.description: A global equities index fell slightly on Monday after hitting record highs last week, as investors took a breather ahead of the next batch of U.S. economic data, while oil prices rallied on concerns about shipping disruptions.翻译:全球股市指数继上周创下历史新高后，周一小幅下跌，因投资者在下一批美国经济数据公布之前稍作喘息，而油价因对航运中断的担忧而上涨。
item.author: Sinéad Carew, Yoruk Bahceli
